name: Sheraton Porto Hotel & Spa

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel for two nights. This is a very modern and clean hotel. Check in was very efficient. We arrived really early and was told to come back at around 1pm to see if a room was ready. since the metro station was only a few blocks away, we hopped on the metro (francos station) and went to the old district and enjoyed the waterfront. When we returned to the hotel, our room was ready. The concierge was extremely helpful and spoke very fluent english. Overall, we were very pleased with our stay.
reviews.title: very chic hotel

reviews.text: I staryed for 5 nights to attend a medical congress. What a spa, breakfast, room service, everything! One of the best hotel experiences where everything was highest quality and friendly at the same time! And I also definetley advice the spa!
reviews.title: One of my best hotel experiences

reviews.text: Stayed for 3 nights for a conference. Can't say anything bad- I had only good experience. Rooms are clean and nicely decorated, staff-very friendly and helpful. What was really extraordinary good- the breakfast! It was the best variety and quality I have ever had!
reviews.title: Best breakfast ever

reviews.text: With some five-star hotels, you wonder where the fifth star came from. At the Sheraton Porto Hotel & Spa, there's no need to. I had a truly excellent stay.
reviews.title: True 5-Star

reviews.text: Of the small things, there are two that I look for. A soap cup and lighting in the closet. My room had both, so well done there. I also liked the electric blinds in the window between the bathroom and the main room, as well as the TV speaker installed above the tub.
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel with truly great spa facilities

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Spent a very nice weekend at the Sheraton, first time in Porto. Initially I was not sure whether the property would be too far away from the city center (10-12min), but could not have been any better as located just in between the city center and the beach (15min). Make sure you have them make a reservation at "Cafeina" (a perfect Saturday night dinner location) and "Shis", latter a very nice place for a Sunday lunch with a very nice view over the Atlantic Ocean. Service has been impecable and the rooms very nice.
reviews.title: Could not have been located better for our trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: You will never get a better hotel for this price! Modern decoration, great service, nice personnel, great breakfast!! We stayed 15 days in Portugal, and we only choose 5 stars hotels. This one was the best!!! "NÃO TÁ LISTO"!!!!
reviews.title: best hotel ever!!

reviews.text: Very nice hotel, very well located. Super confortable room, spatious, great huge bed with nice linnens...Huge bathroom with separate divisions inside (includes a walk-in shower), great toiletries. The view from my bedroom wasn't amazing (faced a building under construction) but you're in the middle of the city, plus my floor was the 3rd and there are 12floors! Great lifts, made of a transparent material that make taking the elevator lots of fun.
reviews.title: Modern and very confortable
Sheraton Porto
reviews.text: The only down side: almost no parking spots near the hotel and a very expensive private parking!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Sheraton in Porto is fantastic. Loved every moment of our stay. Would recommend to anyone.
reviews.title: Very Good hotel, specially for business purposes, which was not my case

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We came to the Sheraton Porto after fleeing La Coruna due to bad weather and a horrible hotel (see Attico21), and were pleased with its airy modern feel. The entire facade of the building is glass and the lobby is bright and cheery. We asked for a room on a high floor and were given a 9th floor, allowing us to fully enjoy the glass elevator which shoots you up in an amusement park ride kinda way. The rooms had that typical starwood mid-level hotel look, which I like. Not showy, but comfortable, with an excellent bed. There is a spa in the hotel, but it costs around 15 euros to enter. We did, in order to use the pool, but didn't think it was worth it, as the pool room is too hot and smells too much of chlorine. There is a patio bar, which seemed inviting, but we didn't have anything there. There is also a restaurant, which is horribly decorated in an embarassing 1980's bigger is better style, but the food and wine we had there were excellent, as was the service. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. Location is not walking distance from the old part of town, but not too far, about 5-10 minutes by car, and is pleasantly residential, and situation behind a big soccer stadium. Overall, I would definitely recommend.
reviews.title: Clean, contemporary, comfortable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was our honeymoon night and it was all perfect. we arrived late and the room was ready with champagne and troufes, and in the bathroom had petals of roses.
reviews.title: Our honeymoon

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The view of our suite was very good.
reviews.title: Nice hotel but overpriced

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff was always friendly and helpfully.
reviews.title: Perfect Honeymoon

reviews.text: Hotel is very nice but was our most expensive hotel of the trip and seemed a little too pricey including parking. There was a charge for Internet in the room but free access was available in the lobby but the response was unreliable. Hotel is on outskirts of town and we took the Metro into town (mostly above ground). You can reach the metro by turning right out of hotel then going two blocks to traffic lights. Cross lights then continue till you see metro line. Metro into town is on side of tracks you are on, no need to cross. Porto is a very mixed bag with some nice areas but many areas are pretty run down. We took the hop-on-off bus which we found useful to find our way around.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel overall

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have to agree with all comments - this is an absolutely ace hotel. It's not best location in Porto - but 5 mins in a taxi to town, 30 min walk or grab the tour buses that pass at the end of the road. Easy parking, great staff, and the bar area is just great - totally relaxing.
reviews.title: Ace hotel in Porto

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is THE Hotel in PORTO! The best service, Rooms, Staff and installations! In fact this is the perfect Hotel to get married! WE MARRIED THERE and it was simply unforgettable! The SPA IS incredible and the Food of the Restaurant is perfect. One of the best Chef's of Portuga is there: Chef Jeronimo!
reviews.title: BEST HOTEL IN PORTO

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: this hotel is very modern and its staff very good. From check in through to restaurant staff they had good knowledge and took the time to respond to requests etc. The gym was very well equipped and modern with personal trainers available at all times. We were in Porto during a national holiday so the spa was booked out and we couldn't make an appoinmtnent. However we were told that it cost guests every time they wanted to use the pool!!
reviews.title: modern hotel, great staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Internet access was available for a charge in the rooms but was free in the hotel lobby although a number of the computers were not working at the time of our visit. The safe in our room did not work but other than that we could not fault the room.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, great value for money

reviews.text: We ate one night at the restaurant and were pleased with the excellent service and food. Breakfast was also very good and the choices available were extensive. The bar area was very comfortable and we had dinner there one night from the bar menu.
reviews.title: Very nice

description: Step into a world where fine art, design and comfort blend beautifully at the Sheraton Porto Hotel & Spa. Our hotel is a modern wonder of marble, wood, steel, and glass, situated in the heart of Porto. Enjoy the convenience of being only a short walk away from fabulous shopping, art museums and nightlife.
